name: Starbyte
overview: In the 31st century, a space freighter carrying plutonium crashes. against an uncharted planet after falling into an electromagnetic storm. Now you; Starbyte, specially trained in deactivating nuclear items, you are in charge of recovering the plutonium from the ship, which threatens to destroy the galaxy and get out of there alive. PROGRAM CONTROLS: KEYS: 0- LEFT, P- RIGHT, Q- SKIP, A- USE, 1- PAUSE. CURRENT SITUATION: Starbyte has entered the ship through a engine, unable to get out. You will soon discover that many compartments are flooded by humidity and their mission will also be interrupted due to obstacles by the fauna of the planet that, due to the plutonium, has suffered important genetic mutations. Remembered the last words of your instructors: "Use everything you you have at your disposal to fight your way through the ship. do not despise anything you find in your path". AUTHORS: Celso Nores Jurado and Oscar Gallego Sendín.
